text: Berlin attack may refer to: * Bombing of Berlin in World War II (1940–45) ** Battle of Berlin (RAF campaign) (1943–44) * Battle of Berlin (1945) ** Race to Berlin (1945) ** Battle in Berlin (1945) * Berlin Blockade (1948–49) * 1982 Berlin restaurant bombing * Bombing of French consulate in West Berlin (1983) * West Berlin discotheque bombing (1986) * 2016 Berlin truck attack
title: Berlin attack
